name: Protect
effect: Reaction. Shield Move. Redirect all moves targeting an Ally to the User until the User's next turn, and reduce minimum damage for received attacks to 0 (attacks still benefit from the base damage of type efficiency). Reduce the damage taken by the user equal to their Rank bonus +1 against redirected attacks, minus the number of rounds this move has been used consecutively by the user
description: The user creates an energy shield to deflect blows meant for an ally
